infos.value: Now, then. Give us all you've got!
Woah, now. The orders were to retreat, were they not?
That man...Engelbert, was it? It seems that once he returns from the front lines, the retreat will commence.
What's your point!?
There's no benefit to needless fighting.
Then let me ask you something.
Do you think we've been useful at all?
...Huh?
Has anything come from our attempts to support others? I don't think so...
You might have a point... But what do you intend to do?
Is it not obvious? I'll leave my mark on them!
...Mark?
Right!
I'll carve my name into their hearts! Too deeply for them to forget!
I think not...
Neither do I.
Agreed.
You must just still be angry at having your name mistaken again.
What's with your lack of support!?
You don't know what I can do! I haven't even tried it yet!
No, I'm pretty sure we know already...
Then I'll just have to show you! Everyone, chaaarge!
Well, I suppose I can accompany you for a little bit.
